alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 04 at 7:19AM EST until January 04 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Western Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 700 AM CST. * At 619 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Eglin Air Force Base, or 8 miles north of Santa Rosa Beach, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, De Funiak Springs, Santa Rosa Beach, Eglin Air Force Base, Live Oak, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Ebro, Hinsons Crossroads, Portland, Cerrogordo, Rock Hill, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry, Knox Hill, Hickory Hill, Argyle and Red Bay. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for the Panhandle of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for the Panhandle of Florida.
